publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3150.1 Tricia Marwick: The Modernising Government Fund-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3150) in the name of Mr Andy Kerr, insert at end ", but recognises that the delivery of first class public services also requires support to the staff working in that sector, adequate funding from central government and a commitment to ensure that the services remain in the public sector." Supported by: Linda Fabiani*
